amendment.description: Amendment to add a new section providing that the Chair may postpone further consideration of the conference report to accompany S.Con.Res. 13 to such time as may be designated by the Speaker.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section providing that the Chair may postpone further consideration of the conference report to accompany S.Con.Res. 13 to such time as may be designated by the Speaker.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 240 - 179 (Roll no. 213).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. McGovern.
